alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Pine; South Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 9:58AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...NEAR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS TODAY FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST MINNESOTA AND NORTHWEST WISCONSIN... Dry conditions and breezy winds will lead to near critical fire weather conditions today. Northerly winds today will be around 5 to 12 MPH with gusts up to near 20 MPH. Minimum relative humidity values of 20 to 30 percent are expected. Together, these conditions could lead to the rapid spread of fires. Check burning restrictions and fire danger before burning. For more information on burning restrictions for Minnesota, see www.dnr.state.mn.us/forestry/fire/firerating_restrictions.html. For more information on burning restrictions for Wisconsin, see apps.dnr.wi.gov/wisburn. For more information on burning restrictions for Minnesota, see www.dnr.state.mn.us/forestry/fire/firerating_restrictions.html. For more information on burning restrictions for Wisconsin, see apps.dnr.wi.gov/wisburn.
